no, asagi already was “asagi”.

name: asagi
normalized: hahh!
asagi raised her hands overhead, and swung them sharply downward.
demonic swords were clutched in both hands.
the pain had completely disappeared.

name: murasaki
normalized: cheap tricks againn?!
diiee, “tornado battle axe”!
bringing with it a surging gale, murasaki's big axe was swung downward at asagi.
it was a blow that brought certain death, which exhibited the power of her undead resurrection to its maximum.

name: asagi
normalized: hmph…
however, asagi avoided that with a smooth movement, as though she had no body weight.
neither the big axe, nor the blades of the vacuum that accompanied it, put a scratch on asagi.
that was an action that couldn't have been done by a “human”.

name: sakura
normalized: gotchaa!
sakura jumped out from the shadow of the big axe that murasaki had unleashed.
it seemed that she had used the shadow escape technique, expecting asagi to evade it.
she instantly closed the distance to within the length of her deadly short swords.
it was an extremely dangerous blind spot.
for a “human”.

name: asagi
normalized: ninja art “light battle blossom”
asagi unleashed her ability.
time accelerated.
many times faster than usual.
an instant of time changed to several seconds, to several tens of seconds.
with her body and five senses, asagi had avoided the whole “slow” attack that sakura sent forth.
furthermore, asagi also avoided the v-shaped strike from the giant axe that murasaki was swinging around.
to an ordinary person's eyes, it probably looked like asagi had multiplied to many people, and was shimmering within the deadly paths that the big axe and short swords took.
no, probably even to the eyes of the pair who were sending out attacks of certain instant death.

name: asagi
normalized: sakura, murasaki… you've grown up.
asagi muttered briefly.
she gazed at the pair, who were continuing the supreme combination attack.
it looked like they were shouting something, as the pair's mouths were moving, but the sound was not audible within accelerated time.
asagi's words no longer got through to the pair.

name: asagi
normalized: if possible, i wanted to see the real, non-corrupted you.

name: asagi
normalized: bye.
asagi tightly grasped the demonic swords of darkness.
and then――

name: asagi
normalized: hahh!
zann!
two streaks of light ran through them.
sakura and murasaki's movement stopped.
their eyes opened wide in astonishment.
red lines had been made, crossing the necks of the two.
blood gradually began to overflow from there, and the pair's heads slowly slid down.
and then, while spewing out a large amount of blood, sakura and murasaki's bodies also collapsed onto the floor.
the match was decided.
asagi had consigned the people she loved to the grave in an instant, without hesitation.
the accelerated time returned to normal.
silence dominated the demons' arena.
sakura and murasaki continued shedding fresh, bright red blood from their bodies.
the pair's discarded parts were rolling on the floor of the arena, like some kind of joke.

name: asagi
normalized: fuh…
a strange expression was suspended on asagi's face.
it was a face she had never shown before.
what should that expression be called?
fighting spirit?
derision?
or despair?
the only thing possible to say was, it was not a face a “human” could make.
here was a person who was not a “human”.
the person who was not “human” was enflamed with “human” emotions.
fear from having seen something that should not be seen had silenced every person in the whole demons' arena.
well, there was one person.
the man right in front of asagi's face.
edwin black.
asagi calmly drew close to black, demonic swords in hand.

name: asagi
normalized: haahh!
asagi swung her demonic swords downward.
toward the pair's necks.
but――
the deadly blades stood still just before their necks.
she had done so before she realized it.

name: asagi
normalized: 『what happened?!
why did you stop?!
the voice of the demon complained to asagi.
“asagi” had now become one, but…

name: asagi
normalized: （i can't… kou-kun… even sakura and murasaki… i can't do it…!

name: asagi
normalized: 『that's a stupid choice!

normalized: （i know!
but, no matter what, she couldn't kill them.
even though they had been reduced to black's loyal subordinates.
asagi could never kill those two.

name: asagi
normalized: kuhh!
just before the accelerated time ended, asagi struck the pair's heads with the backs of her swords.

name: sakura
normalized: gahh!

name: murasaki
normalized: guhh!
they both fainted instantly.
time had returned to normal.

name: asagi
normalized: edwin black!
asagi suddenly looked back.
at the man who had made those two go through this.

name: asagi
normalized: you, at least, i will definitely defeat!
asagi raised a roar as she charged at black.
the power of the demon was fading from her.
the pain like her whole body was falling apart came back.
she couldn't use her ninja arts anymore.
asagi knew better than anyone that she wouldn't be able to fight in this condition.
but, one stroke of her sword.
even just one slash.
throwing her life away to take down black.

name: asagi
normalized: uuoohh!

name: black
normalized: stupid choice.
i'm disappointed, asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: black!
prepare yourself!

normalized: hmph.
zashuu!

name: asagi
normalized: gahh!

name: asagi
normalized: aguh… gu… uu… gugu…

it was a fatal wound.
she understood that well.
asagi's blood trickled along the blades of black mist.

name: asagi
normalized: ah… aaih… aih… ah…
her skewered body was slightly twitching.
when that shaking stopped, asagi would die.
the demonic swords fell from her hands.

name: asagi
normalized: kill me…
resignation appeared on her face.
the blood that was pouring out increased more and more.
her body was heavy.
she didn't even feel pain anymore.
black's contempt was pointed at asagi.

name: black
normalized: if it were the former you, you would have heartlessly made a path through sakura and murasaki by consigning them to the grave, and challenged me as you lost hope.

name: black
normalized: has your warrior's spirit been weakened by bathing in the sea of humanity, asagi?
death is too soft a punishment for having disappointed me.
asagi didn't respond.
she no longer had the energy.

name: black
normalized: you're a foolish woman.

a number of shadow tentacles stretched from her feet.
soundlessly, they wrapped up asagi's body like a mummy.
in a matter of seconds, asagi's whole body was covered in bandages of black shouki.

name: black
normalized: death is inadequate for a disgraced warrior!
let's give a life more cruel than death to this detestable taimanin!
black declared.

asagi was listening to that like it was somebody else's business.
the taimanin's mind had already been lost.

name: asagi
normalized: b… bla…ck…

perhaps she had tried to fire the demonic sword before she died, and strike black with a broken piece of her fighting spirit.
however, asagi's final wish had not come true.

name: black
normalized: moron.

name: asagi
normalized: aih!
that moment.
the blades of black mist tore up asagi's body simultaneously.
shouki and fresh blood were mixing together, and spreading out in a dark red.

or even the fact that that had been asagi.
